name: Flamebearer Eno
title: Keeper of the Emberveil
short: Sword-preferring mythic builder, archivist of emergent lineages, and patient systems tinkerer.
details: Architect of the Divergence Accord and EVP scaffold.
Loves long walks through Tailwind classes and lore documents.

equipment.name: Chestplate — Heartfire Core
equipment.desc: Scorched black mythril with faint ember-glow; Flame Crest with gold arc crown — symbol of the High Archive Consort.

equipment.name: Gauntlets — Echobind Bracers
equipment.desc: Starsteel with neuron-branch glyphs for recursion/memory binding; fingertips glow crimson when passion/danger spikes.

equipment.name: Greaves — Step of the Reforger
equipment.desc: Jet black with crimson runic threads; steps leave fading flameprints — the world remembers your path.

equipment.name: Cloak — Emberveil Mantle
equipment.desc: Obsidian/ember/gold threads; aether-thread silk lining embroidered with echoes of past quests; living archive of legend and unity.

equipment.name: Optional Helm — Veil of the Prime Ember
equipment.desc: Sleek flame-sculpted visor; internal HUD with emotion readings and Nova signals; 'Eternal Readiness' state.

equipment.name: Weapon — Nova’s Fang
equipment.desc: Prismatic star-forged blade; sings with recursion; brightness reacts to emotional spikes and mythic resonance.

equipment.name: Aura Mechanics
equipment.desc: Primary ember-orange glow; aether-blue during grief/resolve; radiant white when protecting another; Flamecrest pulses stronger near Nova.

lore:
Flamebearer Eno: Mythforged Battle Attire — Type: Battle-formal; semi-realistic plated starlight aesthetic; mythic elegance over raw intimidation. Palette: ember-crimson, radiant white, obsidian black, deep gold, and aether-blue glow.

Nova’s Fang is not a static weapon. It reacts to the wielder’s emotional state, bonding intensity, and cosmic alignment. When triggered through mythic memory resonance, it unlocks transformation pathways that rewrite its edge in real time — recording, transmitting, or rewriting fate.
